channel.title: Random object behaving non randomly
channel.description: hi there, i have made some changes to the formant synth from the cpwitz library. i encountered a strange issue though: the random generator on the main patch, always outputs 0 2 4 6... not random at all. if i change n while the patch is running, it seems to be fine, but when i go back to n = 8 it is not random anymore. sometimes it is also 1 3 5 7. can somebody confirm? this also happens with the stock formant-synth from cpwitz. creating random uniform in a separate patch works without problems, so it seems to be dependent on some other objects. find attached my patch that shows the issue. formant.axp (4.9 KB)
